message: that is the last message id you got and what programming language are you using?

trying to do a call of https://convore.com/api/topics/:topic_id/messages.json with an optional parameter of until_id, where should i put the until_id? https://convore.com/api/topics/:topic_id/messages.json?:until_id
can someone show me an example
i am guessing since it is a get method you can just put it on the but more like https://convore.com/api/topics/:topic_id/messages.json?until_id=:until_id
yea..that's what I initially thought.. but it doesn't work...what is the until_id here?
Tring to pull out the messages for a topic and calling that API just gives me an empty result
Can you show me an example? i am just trying this out via a browser and yet it didnt work out

i just test the format i gave you https://convore.com/api/topics/:topic_id/messages.json?until_id=:until_id works like a charm, i could extract the top message using it, just make sure your using the message_id and not the user id by mistake
you only need to provide the until_id if you want to page back in the history of the thread. For the initial call where you want to get the most recent messages you don't need the paramter.
that's what I am trying to do here, I want to page back in the history... but don't know where am I suppose to get the until_id from
@equinox it comes right after the array of messages as you can up above
